body.name: Hyper base LBOX LITE 500G Game Console HDD, Retro Game Console with built in 3762 Games, Plug and Play Video Game Console for PC, Emulator Console Compatible 18 Emulators, Portable Gaming Console HDD

features: 【Game System】Retro game console with launchbox game system, it is a very attractive front-end that can organize your game collection and supports modern games and retro games. It is suitable for OS win8.1 and above.
【Rich Games】Emulator console is compatible with 18 emulators. We have pre-installed 3762 games, including various retro games, arcade games, 3D games, etc. You can also add more games by yourself.
【Plug and Play】Video game console is truly plug-and-play, no complicated settings are required, and it is suitable for Windows system PCs, laptops, and handheld game consoles (win system).

【Game smooth】The transfer speed of the game hard drive can reach 6GB/s, which means fast data transfer and smoother game operation. Note: The output interface is USB3.0, please connect the USB3.0 interface of the device.
【Quality Assurance】 2TB brand original hard drive, large capacity, stable data transmission speed, mini size more portable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug and Play Game HDD "Plug and Play" Gaming HDD (Hard Disk Drive) allows you to easily connect an external hard drive to your gaming system, turning your PC into a massive gaming console where you can play many types of games. This game console HDD is suitable for 64-bit WIN8.1, WIN10, WIN11 and above operating systems. If you want a better gaming experience, we recommend configuring i5 or above CPUs and GTX780 or above GPUs produced by the 4th generation and later.

Support Multiple Languages Emulator game console supports 27 languages, and you can switch the operating language to your usual language, which is more convenient to use. Free FTP In order to better serve customers, we have created our own game resource library. If you want to obtain more game download resources, You can leave a message to the saller to obtain the account password. Safe to Apply Plug-and-play video game consoles do not need to install redundant drivers to ensure the safety of your computer data.

Powerful Combination LaunchBox game system + brand original 2T external hard drive, the combination of powerful game system and quality-assured hard drive, provides you with a better game machine. LaunchBox Game System 1. Your Frontend for Everything LaunchBox aims to be the one-stop shop for gaming on your computer, for both modern and historical games.You can enjoy various types of games. 2. Organize Your Collection LaunchBox supports arranging and filtering by genre, platform, ESRB rating, developer, publisher, and much more, and even has custom status and source fields to use to classify your games however you choose. 3. Immerse Yourself Not only does LaunchBox automatically download box art for your games, it also grabs beautiful fanart, screenshots, logos, and more, creating a surprisingly immersive experience. Brand Original 2T External Hard Drive 1. 2.5-inch portable external hard drive, brand original, quality is better, to provide you with a portable game console. 2. Built-in rich game resources We have pre-installed 1000 popular games in the game console, with a large hard disk space, you can add more games freely. 3. The brand hard disk is powerful, data transmission is fast, and the game is smoother.

Compatible with Multiple Devices This game console is compatible with a variety of devices, such as desktop computers, laptops, mini PCs, and windows system handhelds. You can use this portable game hard disk on a variety of devices, which is convenient for travel and business trips.

Launchbox Game System with Games We have added some emulator games and windows games to the game system, which is compatible with a variety of emulators. If you want to know what games are pre-installed before purchasing, Please contact the seller for a list of games.
Best Gift This game stick supports multiplayer games, you can enjoy game time with your family or friends. It will be a great gift for yourself or family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great selection of games and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: At first I was a little nervous about the combat ability with my computer- but - after I plugged in the hard drive and followed the very simple, read me first instructions, everything just worked as expected. I am very pleased with all the game choices. Also, it's nice to know you can expand the Launch Box program to include other games so you can personalize your library. I would really recommend this game drive for anyone who wants to play retro games from your childhood on up to some newer versions that are still relevant today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The list of games is great , haven't really had an issue with any crashing . The only problem is that I bought the two controllers and alot of the games dont seem to pick up the second controller. If you are soloing this than I would highly recommend, but if you buy the 2 controller set then I would expect that both controllers should work with the 2 player games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great HDD Emulator
reviews.reviewText: Plug-&-Play what more could you ask for? Interface is great, install was easy. I have a gaming laptop, so I could by-pass some of the other files, but came with instructions so wouldn’t be hard anyways. Played a few hours when it arrived to make sure it all worked. It’s going in my laptop bag for trips. Great piece of hardware! Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Full of viruses
reviews.reviewText: We got the hard drive in but it was missing the controller which is one thing but when we plugged it in my antivirus went crazy. We ran Malwarebytes and Webroot on it and there were a little over 15 malicious software on the device. This thing is a major security risk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard drive died on second use
reviews.reviewText: I am not happy with this item.The first time I used this item was simply to test for function. This item is NOT plug and play, as I noticed several things wrong. None of the 3DO games worked at all, and I didn't spend the time to mess around with that console. (Note that other reviews have mentioned this problem with the 3DO ROMs as well.) None of the PS1 games worked at all. Changing the default emulator got most of the games I tested to work, but there were more problems because the bios files for PS1 do not load. NES and Genesis ROMs worked fine. I tested Breath of the Wild on Switch, and that game will repeatedly crash within the first few minutes (but Tears of the Kingdom seems to run fine). Lastly, some of the games I tested for Dreamcast were not in English even though the ROMs were listed as USA (i.e. Sonic Adventures).The second time I used this item I started by testing N64. The emulation seemed to work fine, but the controller settings were very messed up by default. Then I tried to test Gamecube. I started with Bloody Roar and was watching the intro video when a black screen popped up that said "Disc cannot be read." That notice remained on the screen for a few seconds before the emulator crashed and all of LaunchBox crashed. The hard drive also disappeared from all of my available devices. After that, I could not get the item to work again. I retried the hard drive in several different ports with different cables, and even on a different PC. Nothing. I tested all possible components and everything worked other than the hard drive. The LEDs on the hard drive enclosure light up, so it is getting power, but the drive will not read. So the drive is dead... after less than 2 hours of use.Maybe I got a lemon, but I would avoid this item.*** UPDATE ***I applied to return the item for a refund. The seller was very quick to contact me regarding my problems and offer support. With the seller's help I was able to isolate the problem to the hard drive enclosure and not the actual hard drive. (For those who care, the hard drive used in this product is a name brand Toshiba.) The seller has offered to send me a replacement enclosure. Hopefully this item will function after replacing the hard drive enclosure.*** UPDATE ***I am updating my review from 1-star to 4-stars. The seller supplied a replacement hard drive enclosure and upon initial testing the item seems to be working now.This really is a nice product that can provide countless hours of enjoyment. However, I cannot give it 5-stars because there are just too many small issues. As I said earlier, this item is not really plug-and-play. Be warned that you need to have a basic knowledge of emulation because you will have to tinker to get things running correctly. (Please read my initial review for some of the issues I encountered during testing.) Even if you cannot get everything working though, you will have access to more than enough content to make it an enjoyable experience.Also, if you read other reviews you will notice that different customers report different problems. I had some issues that other reviews did not mentions. Some of the issues mentioned in other reviews worked perfectly fine for me right out of the box. I believe this is because every customer is using this hard drive on a different PC with different hardware, updates, drivers, and settings. So everyone user's experience will be different, and that is why you have to have the knowledge to troubleshoot issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product. Awesome Sellers
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for an emulator that is pretty much plug and play this is the one to get. I had a couple of issues with it I contacted the seller and they helped me figure it out. The sellers responded to my questions in a timely manner and were very helpful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal and the seller was very helpful
reviews.reviewText: So being new to emulators I wasn’t sure whIch system to purchase or even how to set it up. This system was super easy to set up on my computer because the unit came with instructions. Also, the seller was quick to answer questions for me when I couldn’t get something to work. All around a great purchase and would recommend.
